extension.description: Kodi Repository for [COLOR steelblue]CellarDoorTV[/COLOR][CR][COLOR steelblue]CellarDoorTV[/COLOR] [COLOR white]Repo[/COLOR] allows you to install our CDTV Wizard and get access to the latest CDTV Custom Builds and more.[CR]This repo will keep your CDTV Wizard and [COLOR steelblue]Hypersonic[/COLOR] [COLOR white]IPTV2[/COLOR] add-on updated with future updates.[CR]For more info go to [COLOR yellowgreen]https://www.hypersonic-tv.com[/COLOR] or email [COLOR yellowgreen]hypersonictvpro@gmail.com[/COLOR] to request your username and password.[CR][COLOR yellowgreen]Thank you![/COLOR]
